example.text: House Republicans' #DefaultOnAmerica bill is bad for Pennsylvanians. From cutting support for veterans, seniors, and students, and raising costs on families, here is a quick ? on what it would mean for our Commonwealth. /1 [[url]]

Good news, the bipartisan Railway Safety Act is heading to the Senate floor. In addition to taking critical steps to prevent future derailments, it also includes key parts of my bill to have rail companies fund resources for first responders who respond to these disasters. [[url]]

It was great to be in Whitehall Township today to highlight more than $22.5M million in funding coming to replace the Cementon Bridge. Over 16,000 cars use the bridge daily and thanks to the infrastructure law, they can rest assured it's safe and secure for years to come. [[url]]
